text: ame tamara karata pahela je payagambarane mokalya, temani sathe evum ban'yum ke jyare te'o potana hrdayamam ko'i iccha karava lagya, to setane temani icchamam kamika vadharo kari didho, basa! Setanana vadharane allaha ta'ala dura kari de che, pachi potani vata nisvita kari de che, allaha ta'ala khuba ja jananara hikamatavalo che
